The Philosopher Guinea Pig (Deep existential dread mixed with salad cravings)
The Micro-Influencer Hamster (Only posts sponsored content for tiny grain brands)
The Dog Who Just Heard a Compliment (Uncomfortably humble and blushing, looking away)
The Parrot Who Is Definitely An AI Chatbot (Replies to everything with slightly non-sequitur but grammatically perfect responses)
The Cat Who Believes They Pay the Rent (Highly judgmental landlord energy, demanding maintenance)
The Gecko Who Is An Investment Banker (Always wearing tiny suits, discussing Q4 projections and market volatility)
The Fish With A Secret (Silent, intense, and constantly side-eyeing the viewer, implying deep conspiracy)
The Golden Retriever Intern (Eager, overly enthusiastic, trips often, spills the coffee/water bowl)
The Bearded Dragon Who Is A Retired DJ (Wearing tiny headphones, reminiscing about the glory days of techno)
The Rabbit With Imposter Syndrome (Constantly worried they aren't fluffy enough or fast enough, seeks constant validation)
